summary: The European Space Exploration Council sends two astronauts to explore a planet similar to the Earth but located on the opposite side of the sun.
cast: Roy Thinnes|Ian Hendry|Patrick Wymark|Lynn Loring|Loni von Friedl|Franco De Rosa|Herbert Lom|George Sewell|Ed Bishop|Philip Madoc|Vladek Sheybal|George Mikell|Keith Alexander|Peter Burton|Anthony Chinn|John Clifford|Maurice Connor|Nicholas Courtney|Maxwell Craig|Cy Grant|Constantine Gregory|Victor Harrington|Alan Harris|Alan Haywood|Jon Kelley|Cyril Kent|Annette Kerr|Martin King|Basil Moss|Norma Ronald|John Stone|Joseph Tregonino|Peter van Dissel|Jeremy Wilkin
title: Más allá del sol
